Sunglasses as a Wind Chime: Attach small bells or chimes to the temples of the sunglasses and hang them from a branch or string. The sunglasses will create a quirky wind chime that adds a fun and unexpected touch to your outdoor space.

Sunglasses as a Desk Organizer: Attach a small notebook or pen holder to the temples of the sunglasses and place them on your desk. The sunglasses will serve as a quirky desk organizer that adds a touch of personality to your workspace.
Sunglasses as a Headband: Cut the temples of the sunglasses to create a headband. The sunglasses will provide a unique and stylish headband that can be worn on a sunny day or as a fun accessory.

Sunglasses as a Bookend: Place the sunglasses upright in your bookcase to hold up your books. The sunglasses will serve as a fun and unexpected bookend that adds a touch of whimsy to your home library.

Sunglasses as a Reading Light: Attach a small LED light to the temples of the sunglasses and place them on your nightstand. The sunglasses will serve as a fun and unique reading light that can be easily moved around your room.
